snippet: In a federal report, both system and human errors occurred, failures that one federal official called “pretty basic things.”
abstract: Federal Energy Regulatory Commission concludes that a combination of human error and system problems contributed to millions of people in Southern California, Arizona and northern Mexico being plunged into darkness in September 2011; report says that no new technology is needed to prevent a repetition, only stricter adherence to operating procedures.
lead_paragraph: In a federal report, both system and human errors occurred, failures that one federal official called “pretty basic things.”

headline.seo: Power Failure in West Is Tied to Combination of Errors
headline.main: Combination of Errors Led to Power Loss in San Diego
headline.print_headline: Combination Of Errors Led To Power Loss In San Diego
